item.title: IND-Y vs PAK-Y Under 19 ICC Final, Today's Match, Dream Team, Prediction
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Welcome to the 2nd semi-final of 2018 Under 19 ICC Cricket World Cup. We will be providing match predictions, probable XI, tips and some tricks to help you win big in this match. This match is going to be awesome as it is not just an ICC event but it is India vs Pakistan.

Event Details

ICC Under 19 World Cup Ind-Y vs Pak-y

  • Hagley Oval, Christchurch
  • Date: Jan30, 3:00 AM IST
Squads
India U19:

Prithvi Shaw(c), Manjot Kalra, Shubman Gill, Harvik Desai(w), Riyan Parag, Abhishek Sharma, Kamlesh Nagarkoti, Anukul Sudhakar Roy, Shivam Mavi, Shiva Singh, Ishan Porel, Aryan Juyal, Arshdeep Singh, Pankaj Yadav, Himanshu Rana, Aditya Thakare

Pakistan U19:

Muhammad Zaid Alam, Rohail Nazir(w), Ammad Alam, Hasan Khan(c), Mohammad Taha, Saad Khan, Muhammad Musa, Shaheen Afridi, Suleman Shafqat, Arshad Iqbal, Imran Shah, Mohammad Ali Khan, Munir Riaz, Ali Zaryab, Muhammad Mohsin Khan

Key Players
India U19:
  • Shubhman Gill
  • Prthvi Shaw
  • Anukul Sudhakar Roy
  • Kamlesh Nagarkoti
  • Abhishek Sharma
  • Shivam Mavi
Pakistan U19:
  • Muhammad Ziad Alam
  • Hasan Khan
  • Shaheen Afridi
  • Ali Zaryab
Ind-Y vs Pak-Y Probable Playing XI :
India U19:

Prithwi Shaw, Manjot Kalra, Shubhman Gill, H Desai, Himanshu Rana, Abhishek Sharma, Anukul Sudhakar Roy, K Nagarkoti, Shiva Singh, Shivam Mavi, Ishan Porel

Pakistan U19:

Muhammad Zaid Alam, Rohail Nazir, Ammad Alam/M Mohsin Khan, Ali Zaryab, Mohammad Taha, Saad Khan, Hasan Khan, Shaheen Afridi, Muhammad Musa, Suleman Shafqat/M Riyaz, Arshad Iqbal

Dream Teams

Suggestions
  • Both the wicket keepers H Desia and R Nazir are good.
  • Indian batsmen would be good choice to have as they are very pro.
  • in All rounders, Anukul, Hasan Khan and K Nagarkoti are good.
  • S Mavi is speed star in this tournamnet so it would be good choice.

Let us know your favourite team and your favourite players.
